snippet.title: Kirby: Invaders from the Dark - Boss Rush Mode (Magic)
snippet.description:
So just because I could do it, here's an entire run of the Boss Rush Mode from the fan game Kirby: Invaders from the Dark. I have to say, this game is rather challenging for even the best Kirby fans! Long levels, only six hits max, and bosses with huge health bars... I can't imagine anybody complaining that K:IftD is too easy.

Now, out of all the Copy Abilities to be overpowered, Hammer is actually not the winner this time. MAGIC IS ACTUALLY USEFUL BECAUSE IT'S LONG RANGE AND EFFICIENT! Not even the Staff of Cosmos, the final weapon, can top Magic.

As for the bosses, the portions of the final boss where you use the Staff of Cosmos were obviously the most difficult for me. I get trapped often in the second phase, and the third phase is predictable but incredibly hard to dodge.

But overall, it's a nostalgic fan game that tests your Kirby skills! I loved it.
